name: Babadook
description:
Do you seek for thrills?
Enter the forgotten laboratory house of Babadook where evil lives and multiplies in the darkness just waiting for you go walk through!

You need to find your way out as quickly as possible without getting killed by gene manipulated and highly aggressive creatures.
Explore the rooms, take it easy because evil might just wait around the corner.
Try ho hit the light switches if you can find any, you might just see a bit better.

For extra THRILLS, tune up your volume to the max in your device or even better, plug in your earphones and let the horror freak show of Babadook begin!
